title: A layover in London
description: On our way to South Africa, we stopped over in London to spend a few days seeing friends and exploring the city.

title: South Africa, bru
description: You really get a sense of how large Africa is when you fly over the entire thing. After 14 hours of flying, we finally arrived in the beautiful city of Cape Town.

title: Garonga Safari Company
description: Our safari experience at Garonga was both tranquil and thrilling, offering close encounters with Africa's iconic wildlife and indulgent relaxation in the heart of the bush.
